LanguageData.CleaningTimeFactor.label: cleaning time multiplier
LanguageData.CleaningTimeFactor.description: A multiplier on how long it takes to clean filth from this surface.
LanguageData.ConstructionSpeedFactor.label: construction speed
LanguageData.ConstructionSpeedFactor.description: The speed at which buildings made of this are constructed is multiplied by this value.\n\nSome materials, like stone, are slow to build from, while others, like wood, are fast.
LanguageData.FilthMultiplier.label: filth multiplier
LanguageData.FilthMultiplier.description: How susceptible this surface is to filth. If this is less than 100%, some of the filth deposited here will disappear on contact. This only applies to organic filth.
LanguageData.MedicalPotency.label: medical potency
LanguageData.MedicalPotency.description:
How effective this is when used to tend wounds and diseases, or do surgery.

Higher medical potency improves the quality of tending, and acts as a multiplier on the chance of success during surgery.
Medical potency is just one factor in medical outcomes, among many others, including doctor ability, equipment, cleanliness, and luck.
LanguageData.MedicalQualityMax.label: medical tend quality maximum
LanguageData.MedicalQualityMax.description: The maximum quality of medical tending that can be achieved while using this.\n\nBetter tend quality allows skilled doctors to treat wounds better, as well as more reliably.
LanguageData.MeditationFocusStrength.label: meditation psyfocus bonus
LanguageData.MeditationFocusStrength.description: The amount of extra psyfocus someone gains by focusing on this object during meditation, in addition to their own base rate of meditation psyfocus gain.\n\nFor some objects, this number can change depending on the surroundings and the person doing the meditating.
LanguageData.PsychicEntropyMaxOffset.label: neural heat limit offset
LanguageData.PsychicEntropyMaxOffset.description: An offset applied to the user's neural heat limit.
LanguageData.PsychicEntropyRecoveryRateOffset.label: neural heat recovery rate offset
LanguageData.PsychicEntropyRecoveryRateOffset.descrip: An offset applied to the user's neural heat recovery rate.
LanguageData.PsychicSensitivityFactor.label: psychic sensitivity factor
LanguageData.PsychicSensitivityFactor.description: A factor applied to the user's psychic sensitivity.
LanguageData.PsychicSensitivityOffset.label: psychic sensitivity offset
LanguageData.PsychicSensitivityOffset.description: An offset applied to the user's psychic sensitivity.
